name: Alys Beach
description: Alys Beach is a premier planned community on Scenic Highway 30A in Northwest Florida, known for its distinctive white stucco architecture inspired by Mediterranean, Bermuda, and Moorish design traditions. Designed by DPZ CoDesign, the community features cobblestone streets, lush courtyards, and stunning Gulf of Mexico views. Alys Beach serves as the home for the annual 30A Wine Festival.
address: 9581 E County Highway 30A, Alys Beach, FL 32461
architecture: White stucco Mediterranean, Bermuda, and Moorish-inspired design by DPZ CoDesign
parking: Amphitheatre parking lot at the corner of Highway 30A and Somerset Street

name: Red Loggia at Caliza Restaurant
description: The Red Loggia is a striking open-air dining space at Caliza Restaurant, one of Alys Beach's signature dining destinations. Known for its dramatic red architecture and poolside ambiance, the Red Loggia provides an intimate and luxurious setting for the Wine Dinner.

name: Arboleda Park
description: Arboleda Park is a charming green space within Alys Beach, surrounded by the community's signature white architecture and lush landscaping. It provides an elegant outdoor setting for the Oysters + Champagne event.

name: Papilio Park
description: Papilio Park is a vibrant gathering space in Alys Beach, named after the butterfly genus. The park's intimate layout and beautiful surroundings make it an ideal venue for the Tapas & Tequila event.

name: Central Park
description: Central Park is one of Alys Beach's largest green spaces, offering ample room for larger festival events. Its expansive lawn and scenic setting host both the Bourbon, Beer & Butts event and the Rosé & Croquet closing celebration.

name: South Charles Street to Gulf Green
description: The route from South Charles Street to Gulf Green is transformed into the festival's grandest thoroughfare for the Grand Tasting. This iconic stretch showcases Alys Beach's white stucco architecture as a backdrop for hundreds of wine, spirit, and culinary stations.

name: Gulf Green
description: Gulf Green is a picturesque lawn area near the Gulf of Mexico within Alys Beach. With ocean breezes and stunning coastal views, it serves as the venue for the Gospel Brunch and as part of the Grand Tasting route.
